div.font:
1. 位数代表层数
2. 每层最多10个部门
3. 也可多位表部门, 则层数减少

div.span: with tmp as (
select * from department where id=4
union all
select a.* from department a, tmp b where a.parent_id=b.id
select * from tmp;

div.span: create table department
id int auto_increment primary key,
name varchar(50) charset utf8 not null,
parent_id int null

div.style: display: flex; align-items: unsafe center; justify-content: unsafe flex-start; width: 218px; height: 1px; padding-top: 955px; margin-left: 2px;
box-sizing: border-box; font-size: 0; text-align: left;
display: inline-block; font-size: 14px; font-family: Helvetica; color: #666600; line-height: 1.2; pointer-events: none; white-space: normal; word-wrap: normal;

div.span: create table department (
id int auto_increment primary key,
name varchar(50) charset utf8 not null,
lft int not null,
rgt int not null,
leve int not null // 直接子部门

div.style: display: flex; align-items: unsafe center; justify-content: unsafe flex-start; width: 158px; height: 1px; padding-top: 135px; margin-left: 422px;
box-sizing: border-box; font-size: 0; text-align: left;
display: inline-block; font-size: 12px; font-family: Helvetica; color: #000000; line-height: 1.2; pointer-events: none; white-space: normal; word-wrap: normal;
display: flex; align-items: unsafe center; justify-content: unsafe flex-start; width: 348px; height: 1px; padding-top: 1095px; margin-left: 332px;
box-sizing: border-box; font-size: 0; text-align: left;
display: inline-block; font-size: 14px; font-family: Helvetica; color: #666600; line-height: 1.2; pointer-events: none; white-space: normal; word-wrap: normal;

div.span: 1. 查询产品部所有节点: lft=3,rgt=8
select* from department where lft>3 and lft<8

2. 查询产品部子部门个数: lft=3,rgt=8
count=(rgt-lft-1)/2=(8-3-1)/2=2
3. 是否子节点
rgt-1==lft || lft+1==rgt
4.
查询产品部的直接子部门: lft=3,rgt=8
select* from department where lft>3 and lft<8 and level=3+1
5. 在产品部下新增部门:
lft=3,rgt=8

新部门的lft=8, rgt=9, level=4
update department set lft=lft+2 where lft>@lft;
update department set rgtrgtt+2 where rgt>=@lft;

insert into department(name, lft, rgt, level) value('zack部', @lft, @rgt, @level)
6.删除部门
update department set lft=lft-2 where lft>@lft;
update department set rgt=rgt+2 where rgt>@lft;

switch.text: 1. 查询产品部所有节点: lft=3,rgt=8...

a.text: Viewer does not support full SVG 1.1
